message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value and quality.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $8500. This is a compromise that still reflects the product's value and quality.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise further. I'll offer you $8200 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
